      • cancelRunningTask

        protected boolean cancelRunningTask()
        Cancel the active background task (if there is one) if it is cancelable. Show a message to the user if the task cannot be canceled at the current time.
        Returns:
        Returns true if there is no task or if it is cancelable. Returns false if the active task cannot be canceled at the current time.

                          throws FormValidationException

      • validateFileField

        protected void validateFileField(javax.swing.text.JTextComponent txt,
                                 boolean allowEmpty,
                                 boolean forOutput)
                          throws FormValidationException
        Verifies the existence of a file in a JTextComponent that has been added as a named file-field.
        Parameters:
        txt - The JTextComponent used to accept file entry.
        allowEmpty - Whether the field is optional (and so can be empty and still be valid input).
        forOutput - Whether the field is the name of an output file. (If so, it does not need to exist, but must be in a valid directory.
        Throws:
        FormValidationException - if txt fails validation.

      • validateRequiredField

        protected void validateRequiredField(javax.swing.text.JTextComponent txt)
                              throws FormValidationException
        Throws:
        FormValidationException
